content: I was planning to buy some outdoor gear today, so I went to check out Glenn's shop. That's where I saw the <style=Highlight>{今日想要}</style>!

content: {A挠头}Too bad I have an upcoming trip with the archaeological team. Things are a bit tight for me right now... <style=SizeSmall>I should probably save a bit more first...</style>
